translated: and the consciousnesses of the elements, etc. are not reasonable without a cause for the differentiation of the various kinds of wood, wine, etc.

original: de 'ga' yang med ces bya bas ni rnam par dbye ba med pa'i 'byung ba rnams bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de 'ga' yang med ces bya bas ni rnam par dbye ba med pa'i 'byung ba rnams bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is that there is no differentiation of the elements, etc.

original: rgyu'i rnam par dbye ba med na 'bras bu'i rnam par dbye ba legs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i rnam par dbye ba med na 'bras bu'i rnam par dbye ba legs pa ma yin te /
translated: If there is no differentiation of the cause, there is no differentiation of the effect.

original: de dngos sa bon las zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa las so //
analyzed: de dngos sa bon las zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa las so //
translated: The word from means without distinction.

original: ma nges pa ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: The word uncertain means distinct.

original: nges pa med pa ni nges pa can gyi nges par byed pa ma yin par ni bden mod kyi nges pa can la nges par byed par brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa med pa ni nges pa can gyi nges par byed pa ma yin par ni bden mod kyi nges pa can la nges par byed par brtags pa yin no //
translated: It is true that uncertain does not make certain what is certain, but it is imagined to make certain what is certain.

original: de yang 'byung ba la yod pa nyid kyi sna tshogs pa la las rnams nges par byed pa yin zhes ci las yin /
analyzed: de yang 'byung ba la yod pa nyid kyi sna tshogs pa la las rnams nges par byed pa yin zhes ci las yin /
translated: And how is it that the various actions make certain what exists in the elements?

original: chos can gyi rnam par rtog pa bas chos su rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i phyir mchog yin no //
analyzed: chos can gyi rnam par rtog pa bas chos su rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i phyir mchog yin no //
translated: It is supreme because it abandons the conceptual thought of the object, in order to abandon the conceptual thought of the object-possessor.

original: chos can du brtogs  pa'i nus pa sna tshogs pa tsam ni chos yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: chos can du brtogs  pa'i nus pa sna tshogs pa tsam ni chos yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The mere variety of the capacity of the object-possessor is the object.

original: de phyir dbang sogs rang rig la //
analyzed: de phyir dbang sogs rang rig la //
translated: Therefore, the sense faculties, etc., are not self-awareness.

original: ltos pa med par ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ltos pa med par ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúwithout depending on . . . ‚Äù

original: gang dag kho na goms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / mi brjod pa la sogs pa rnams dang dbugs la sogs pa rnams kyang mthong ba de rnams kho na skye ba'i dbang po la yang dmigs pa yin gyi me dang phrad pa las byung ba'i tshogs pa las ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang dag kho na goms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / mi brjod pa la sogs pa rnams dang dbugs la sogs pa rnams kyang mthong ba de rnams kho na skye ba'i dbang po la yang dmigs pa yin gyi me dang phrad pa las byung ba'i tshogs pa las ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Those who are born with the wisdom that arises from habit, and who see the in-breath, etc., and the sense faculties, etc., have the sense faculties as their object, not the collection that arises from contact with fire,

original: snga rol du yang rigs kyi dbye ba yongs su gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga rol du yang rigs kyi dbye ba yongs su gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the division of the species is already clear beforehand.

original: de de bzhin du skye pa'i dang po'i dbugs la sogs pa ni rang gi rigs kyi goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid kyis skye ba snga mar grub pa yin la /üîΩ'gro ba'i sna tshogs pa'i rgyu 'byung pa'i chos nyid kyi rtogs pa'i khyad par byed pa'i dgos @208a * //
analyzed: de de bzhin du skye pa'i dang po'i dbugs la sogs pa ni rang gi rigs kyi goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid kyis skye ba snga mar grub pa yin la / 'gro ba'i sna tshogs pa'i rgyu 'byung pa'i chos nyid kyi rtogs pa'i khyad par byed pa'i dgos @208a * //
translated: The first breath of one who is born in this way is established in a previous birth, because it arises due to the prior habituation of its own type.

original: pa ni 'jig rten pha rol med pa ni de dang 'gal ba'i phyir bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: pa ni 'jig rten pha rol med pa ni de dang 'gal ba'i phyir bkag pa yin no //
translated: The purpose of the reasoning that ascertains the nature of the elements, the cause of the variety of migrating beings, is to refute the nonexistence of a world beyond.

original: rang gi rigs kyi goms pa las byung ba nyid la thal ches pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten pha rol yod pas khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi goms pa las byung ba nyid la thal ches pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten pha rol yod pas khyab pa yin te /
translated: The existence of a world beyond is pervaded by the fact that it arises from the habituation of its own type.

original: khyab par byed pa 'gal bas khyab pa yin par bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa 'gal bas khyab pa yin par bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The pervasion is established by the contradiction of the pervader.

original: 'bras bu med pa'i rtogs pa ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i rtogs pa ni //
translated: The realization that there is no effect

original: 'thad par bya ba ma yin te //
analyzed: 'thad par bya ba ma yin te //
translated: is not tenable.

original: nus pa du ma can gyi 'byung ba 'bras bu gcig byed pa can yin na /
analyzed: nus pa du ma can gyi 'byung ba 'bras bu gcig byed pa can yin na /
translated: If the elements, which have many potencies, were to produce a single effect,

original: nus pa gzhan gyi bskyed bya'i 'bras bu gzhan du yang de'i tshe kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nus pa gzhan gyi bskyed bya'i 'bras bu gzhan du yang de'i tshe kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the other effect generated by another potential would also arise at that time.

original: de bzhin du skyed byed ma yin na rim gyis kyang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du skyed byed ma yin na rim gyis kyang mi 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, if it does not generate, it would not arise gradually,

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not rely on another.

original: las su smra ba la ni de las gzhan byas pa yin la ltos pa gzhan yang yod pa de'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: las su smra ba la ni de las gzhan byas pa yin la ltos pa gzhan yang yod pa de'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: But for the proponents of karma, the other is produced by another, and another relies on it, therefore there is no error.

original: de'i phyir 'gro ba sna tshogs pa'i rgyu 'byung ba'i chos rnams nyid nus pa'i khyad par du brtag pa ma yin te /üîΩgang gi phyir shes rab dang mi brjod pa'i blo la sogs pa rnams skye ba'i dang po la rang gi rigs la mi ltos pa rnams 'byung bar khas len pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gro ba sna tshogs pa'i rgyu 'byung ba'i chos rnams nyid nus pa'i khyad par du brtag pa ma yin te / gang gi phyir shes rab dang mi brjod pa'i blo la sogs pa rnams skye ba'i dang po la rang gi rigs la mi ltos pa rnams 'byung bar khas len pa yin na /
translated: Therefore the cause of the diversity of the world is not the specific potential of the elements themselves.üîΩBecause it is accepted that the first arising of wisdom, memory, and so on do not rely on their own type.

original: ji ltar skye ba'i dang por 'byung pa shes rab dang mi brjed pa'i blo la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su gyur pa rang gi rigs la ltos pa med pa de kho na bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba'i dang por 'byung pa shes rab dang mi brjed pa'i blo la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su gyur pa rang gi rigs la ltos pa med pa de kho na bzhin du /
translated: Just as the first arising of wisdom, memory, and so on occurs without relying on a transformation possessing wisdom and memory,

original: de las gzhan yang 'gyur ba la ci las yin zhe na //
analyzed: de las gzhan yang 'gyur ba la ci las yin zhe na //
translated: What else could change be?

original: byang par med pas skye ba'i dngos po las 'byung ba rnams dang goms pa las byung ba rnams kyang tha dad par nye bar ma mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang par med pas skye ba'i dngos po las 'byung ba rnams dang goms pa las byung ba rnams kyang tha dad par nye bar ma mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the case that the elements are not different from the thing that arises, because the elements that arise from birth and the elements that arise from development are not distinguished.

original: 'di la yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, too, that is not the case,

original: de'i bskyed ba ni /
analyzed: de'i bskyed ba ni /
translated: because the production of that

original: goms pa la rag las par mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: goms pa la rag las par mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: is seen to depend on development.

original: de'i nus pa mthong ba yin gyi 'byung ba'i nus pa ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i nus pa mthong ba yin gyi 'byung ba'i nus pa ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: The power of that is seen, but the power of the elements is not like that.

original: gzhan las byung ba yang ri la du ba bzhin du de la mthong ba 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las byung ba yang ri la du ba bzhin du de la mthong ba 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The arising from another is not contradicted, because it is seen in smoke, for example.

original: bum pa ni me dang phrad pa'i sngon rol du khyad par can yongs su gyur pa ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa ni me dang phrad pa'i sngon rol du khyad par can yongs su gyur pa ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: A pot is not like that, because it is not a transformation that is different before it comes in contact with fire.

original: sngon po dang dmar po la sogs pa tha dad par yongs su gsal ba yin no zhes gzhung dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: sngon po dang dmar po la sogs pa tha dad par yongs su gsal ba yin no zhes gzhung dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is a manifestation that is different, such as blue, red, and so on.

original: yang na 'byung ba rnams kyi tha mi dad pa'am yong su gyur pa'am /
analyzed: yang na 'byung ba rnams kyi tha mi dad pa'am yong su gyur pa'am /
translated: Or, the elements are not different from the transformation.

original: yongs su gyur pa yang khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa yang khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: and the transformation is also undifferentiated.

original: khyad par med pas dmigs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su gyur pa bong ba dang rtsig pa la sogs pa dang 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyad par med pas dmigs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su gyur pa bong ba dang rtsig pa la sogs pa dang 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the transformation that is endowed with the eye faculty, etc., would be undifferentiated, and would be like a lump of clay or a wall, etc.

original: sna tshogs pa gcig gi ngo bor @208b 'gyur gyi sna tshogs pa nyid du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa gcig gi ngo bor @208b 'gyur gyi sna tshogs pa nyid du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the various would become one nature, but not that the various would not exist.

original: dbang rnams re re la gnod kyang //
analyzed: dbang rnams re re la gnod kyang //
translated: Even if each of the sense faculties is impaired,

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig su bcad pa'i //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig su bcad pa'i //
translated: the verse says,

original: skye ba yongs su len pa na //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su len pa na //
translated: when one takes rebirth,

original: zhes bya ba 'di bshad pas de la gtad pas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di bshad pas de la gtad pas bshad pa yin no //
translated: this is explained by the word ‚Äúthere.‚Äù

original: da ni de'i 'grel pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni de'i 'grel pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the commentary on that will be explained.

original: de la bum pa me dang phrad pa'i bskyed bya rnam par 'gyur ba yang de kho na las skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de la bum pa me dang phrad pa'i bskyed bya rnam par 'gyur ba yang de kho na las skye ba ma yin te /
translated: There, the transformation that is produced by the contact of a pot with fire is not produced from that alone,

original: rdza mkhan las skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //üîΩdbang po rnams ni yid kyi bsgyur bya yin la /
analyzed: rdza mkhan las skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro // dbang po rnams ni yid kyi bsgyur bya yin la /
translated: because it is seen to be produced from the potter.üîΩThe sense faculties are what the mind transforms,

original: de gsal ba yin na dbang po rnams gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: de gsal ba yin na dbang po rnams gsal ba yin te /
translated: and if the mind is clear, the sense faculties are clear.

original: bzlog pa yin na log pa yin gyi gzhan las skye bar mthong ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa yin na log pa yin gyi gzhan las skye bar mthong ba yang ma yin no //
translated: If it were the opposite, it would be wrong, but it is not seen to arise from another.

original: de'i phyir de kho na las skye ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na las skye ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that it arises only from itself.

original: bum pa la sogs pa mes byas pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba kho na yin pa'i phyir dpe ma yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa mes byas pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba kho na yin pa'i phyir dpe ma yin par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not right to say that the example is not appropriate because a pot, etc. is only a transformation produced by fire.

original: skye ba'i dang po'i dbang po yang yid kyi rnam par 'gyur ba nyid las ma mthong ba yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i dang po'i dbang po yang yid kyi rnam par 'gyur ba nyid las ma mthong ba yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the first sense faculty of birth is not seen to arise from the transformation of mind alone.

original: phyogs la 'khrul pa yin zhes bya ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs la 'khrul pa yin zhes bya ba yang ma yin no //
translated: It is also not right to say that it is a mistake in the position.

original: de lta na ni gang yang ma nges pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ba ni bum pa la sogs pa yang rdza mkhan gyi bskyed byar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni gang yang ma nges pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ba ni bum pa la sogs pa yang rdza mkhan gyi bskyed byar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it were so, then it would not be the case that nothing is ascertained. A pot, etc. would not be produced by a potter,

original: de yang phyogs su phyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang phyogs su phyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is also limited to a position.

original: de la ni rdza mkhan gyi bskyed byar mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: de la ni rdza mkhan gyi bskyed byar mthong ba yin la /
translated: But it is seen that it is produced by a potter.

original: des na me'i bskyed bya nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na me'i bskyed bya nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not produced by fire.

original: de'i phyir me ni rnam par 'gyur ba skyed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir me ni rnam par 'gyur ba skyed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, fire is the cause of the arising of the transformation,

original: rang gi ngo bo ni skyed byed ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni skyed byed ma yin no //
translated: but not the cause of its own nature.

original: dbang po yang skye ba'i dang po 'byung ba'i bskyed bya yin te /
analyzed: dbang po yang skye ba'i dang po 'byung ba'i bskyed bya yin te /
translated: The sense faculty is the cause of the arising of the first moment of consciousness,

original: de ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen in that way.

original: de'i tshe yid kyi bskyed bya nyid du nye bar mtshon pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yid kyi bskyed bya nyid du nye bar mtshon pa ni ma yin te /
translated: At that time, it is not indicated as the cause of mental consciousness,

original: gzhan gyi tshe'i yid kyi bsgyur bya lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe'i yid kyi bsgyur bya lta bu'o //
translated: like the mental faculty at another time.

original: de tshe yang de'i bskyed bya nyid ma yin te ;
analyzed: de tshe yang de'i bskyed bya nyid ma yin te ;
translated: At that time, it is not the cause of that,

original: gzhan du de'i bsgyur bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du de'i bsgyur bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because elsewhere it is the cause of mental consciousness.

original: gzhan med kyang mes bum pa bzhin du yin la /
analyzed: gzhan med kyang mes bum pa bzhin du yin la /
translated: Even when there is no other, it is like a pot by fire.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba kho na de'i 'bras bu nyid yin gyi de bzhin du du ba yang de'i bskyed bya nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba kho na de'i 'bras bu nyid yin gyi de bzhin du du ba yang de'i bskyed bya nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, what is seen is just the effect of that, but smoke does not become the effect of that in the same way,

original: me'i bskyed bya nyid du tshang ba la sogs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me'i bskyed bya nyid du tshang ba la sogs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen to be the effect of fire in a complete set.

original: de bzhin du dbang po yid kyi bskyed bya nyid yin par 'gar yang mthong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po yid kyi bskyed bya nyid yin par 'gar yang mthong ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, the sense faculty is never seen to be produced by the mental faculty.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsdus kyang dbang po yod pas mthong ba yod par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsdus kyang dbang po yod pas mthong ba yod par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, even when all conceptualization is included, it is said that the existence of the sense faculty is due to the existence of seeing.

original: 'on te snga rol du yod pa las skyes pa'i dbang po ni rdza mkhan las bum pa bzhin du phyis rgyun du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te snga rol du yod pa las skyes pa'i dbang po ni rdza mkhan las bum pa bzhin du phyis rgyun du byed pa yin no //
translated: Or, if the sense faculty is produced from that which exists prior to it, then the sense faculty is the cause of the continuum, just as the potter is the cause of the pot.

original: de'i gnas skabs @209a * //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs @209a * //
translated: But that state

original: kyang rnam par rtog pa gzhan med kyang bdag go zhes bya ba'i blo med pa ma yin te /üîΩnga rgyal dang bcas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: kyang rnam par rtog pa gzhan med kyang bdag go zhes bya ba'i blo med pa ma yin te / nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ram /
translated: is not without the cognition ‚ÄúI am,‚Äù even when there is no other conceptualization.üîΩThis is because it is the cause of the pride ‚ÄúI am,‚Äù

original: de'i bag chags rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i bag chags rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir te /
translated: or because the latent impressions of that [pride] are operative.

original: des na skyon med do //üîΩgnyid mthug pos non na sems nyid chad pa'i phyir dbang po yang chad pa yin la /
analyzed: des na skyon med do // gnyid mthug pos non na sems nyid chad pa'i phyir dbang po yang chad pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, there is no fault.üîΩWhen one is overcome by deep sleep, the sense faculty is interrupted because the mind itself is interrupted.

original: sad pa'i dus su ni gnyid rtsom pa'i sems kho na las sems dang / dbang po yang 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: sad pa'i dus su ni gnyid rtsom pa'i sems kho na las sems dang / dbang po yang 'byung ba yin no //
translated: But at the time of waking, the mind and the sense faculty arise from the mind that began the sleep.

original: de 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu nyid du grub na rtog par byed par rigs kyi gzhan du nye bar rtogs pa tsam ni rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi btang snyoms su bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu nyid du grub na rtog par byed par rigs kyi gzhan du nye bar rtogs pa tsam ni rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi btang snyoms su bya ba yin no //
translated: If it were established as the effect of mental consciousness, then it would be reasonable to conceive it as an agent. Otherwise, mere apprehension is to be disregarded by those who are conceptual.

original: de grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But that is not established,

original: phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen to be mistaken.

original: de ltar bstan pa ni 'on te de'i rnam par bsgyur bya nyid ces brjod pas /
analyzed: de ltar bstan pa ni 'on te de'i rnam par bsgyur bya nyid ces brjod pas /
translated: If it is taught in this way, then by saying ‚Äúit is the object of transformation,‚Äù

original: de'i bskyed bya nyid kho na yin bar bsams pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya nyid kho na yin bar bsams pa yin na /
translated: if it is intended that it is merely the product of that,

original: de ma grub pa yin te mes bum pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de ma grub pa yin te mes bum pa lta bu'o //
translated: then that is not established, like a pot by fire.

original: rnam par bsgyur bya nyid tsam la rgyun ni de'i 'bras bu nyid du brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par bsgyur bya nyid tsam la rgyun ni de'i 'bras bu nyid du brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Mere object of transformation is not expressed as the effect of that continuum.

original: lus dang dbang po la sogs pa srid par rtogs pa thams cad yin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i rjes su byed pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba nyid du mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: lus dang dbang po la sogs pa srid par rtogs pa thams cad yin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i rjes su byed pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba nyid du mthong ba yin la /
translated: The body, sense faculties, and so on are all conceived to be possible, but it is seen that they are transformations that conform to transformations.

original: skye ba'i dbang po la yang de'i rnam par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa de sngon du 'gro ba can du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba'i dbang po la yang de'i rnam par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa de sngon du 'gro ba can du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The sense faculty of birth is also understood to be preceded by that which possesses its form.

original: rgyun ni de'i bskyed bya'am gzhan gyis bskyed bya yin zhes bya ba gang du dgos pa yin /
analyzed: rgyun ni de'i bskyed bya'am gzhan gyis bskyed bya yin zhes bya ba gang du dgos pa yin /
translated: What is the need to say that the continuum is produced by that or produced by another?

original: rnam par 'gyur ba rnams gzhan nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba rnams gzhan nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: The transformations are not different from that.

original: de nyid ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is recognized as just that.

original: de dag tsam las kyang skye ba gzhan grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag tsam las kyang skye ba gzhan grub pa yin te /
translated: But birth is established from just that,

original: rnam par 'gyur ba la brten pa nyid kyis thams cad du yang nye bar gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba la brten pa nyid kyis thams cad du yang nye bar gnas pa yin la /
translated: because it is based on the transformations, it is present everywhere,

original: de'i sgo nas rgyun yang yin pa'i phyir de rten nyid du brjod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas rgyun yang yin pa'i phyir de rten nyid du brjod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: and because it is the continuum through that, it should be understood that it is called the basis.

original: dbang po rnams ni skye ba'i dang po rnams las byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni skye ba'i dang po rnams las byung ba rnams so //
translated: The sense faculties arise from the first of the births.

original: yid kyi shes pa las te 'das pa'i skye ba las byung ba las 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yid kyi shes pa las te 'das pa'i skye ba las byung ba las 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: From the mental consciousness, because it arises from the past birth.

original: thog ma med pa nyid yin la de las kyang zhes bya ba skye ba'i dang por las byung ba'i dbang po las byung ba rnams las /
analyzed: thog ma med pa nyid yin la de las kyang zhes bya ba skye ba'i dang por las byung ba'i dbang po las byung ba rnams las /
translated: And from that, the five sense consciousnesses arise in sequence.

original: rang gi shes pa lnga po'i rim gyis yid kyi rnam shes 'byung ba yin la /üîΩskye ba la ni de las kyang yang gzhan yin la de las kyang gzhan rnams te /
analyzed: rang gi shes pa lnga po'i rim gyis yid kyi rnam shes 'byung ba yin la / skye ba la ni de las kyang yang gzhan yin la de las kyang gzhan rnams te /
translated: From that, mental consciousness arises.üîΩFrom that, other consciousnesses arise.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i srid pa las byung ba rnams 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i srid pa las byung ba rnams 'byung ba yin te /
translated: From future existence, other consciousnesses arise.

original: nga rgyal dang bcas pa nyid kyis gdon mi za bar 'byung pa'i @209b 'bras bu dang ldan pa nyid 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang bcas pa nyid kyis gdon mi za bar 'byung pa'i @209b 'bras bu dang ldan pa nyid 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the projecting cause definitely possesses the result that arises from it, since it possesses pride.

original: gnyen po bsgoms pa med pa las ni mtha' med pa yin pa da lta bu ni 'grel pa'i dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyen po bsgoms pa med pa las ni mtha' med pa yin pa da lta bu ni 'grel pa'i dgos pa yin no //
translated: The purpose of the commentary is that if one does not cultivate the antidote, there is no end.

original: lhag ma ni tshigs su bcad pa'i phyi ma'i phyed snga mas gtan tshigs gzhan dang / phyed phyi mas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid kyis lan btab pas bshad nas tshig gi don bshad pas kyang /
analyzed: lhag ma ni tshigs su bcad pa'i phyi ma'i phyed snga mas gtan tshigs gzhan dang / phyed phyi mas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid kyis lan btab pas bshad nas tshig gi don bshad pas kyang /
translated: The remainder is the response to the second half of the first verse, which states the reason, and to the second half of the second verse, which states the reason is indeterminate.üîΩThe meaning of the words has been explained.

original: don 'di kho na 'chad pa ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don 'di kho na 'chad pa ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the words is explained in the passage beginning with ‚Äúbecause‚Äù and so on.

original: phyed snga ma 'chad ba ni de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyed snga ma 'chad ba ni de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The first half of the second verse is explained in the passage beginning with ‚ÄúIn the same way, the mental consciousness is the special product of familiarity.‚Äù

original: goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yin la /
analyzed: goms pa'i bskyed bya'i khyad par ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yin la /
translated: The special product of familiarity is the mental consciousness.

original: dbang po bstan pa lus la brtan pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: dbang po bstan pa lus la brtan pa ji ltar yin /
translated: How is it that the teaching of the sense faculties is based on the body?

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsgyur zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //üîΩgang kho na las yin pa de las de'i tshogs pa ni de'i rten ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pas bsgyur zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so // gang kho na las yin pa de las de'i tshogs pa ni de'i rten ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe mental consciousness is transformed‚Äù is the reason.

original: dbang po lnga tshogs pa ni de'i 'bras bu la /
analyzed: dbang po lnga tshogs pa ni de'i 'bras bu la /
translated: The collection of those faculties is not the basis of that mental consciousness, because the collection of the five sense faculties is the result of the mental consciousness.

original: gzugs dang ro la sogs pa'i rnam shes lnga po de la brten pa yin la /
analyzed: gzugs dang ro la sogs pa'i rnam shes lnga po de la brten pa yin la /
translated: The five consciousnesses of form, taste, and so on are based on that mental consciousness.

original: de'i rang rig pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa bdag go zhes bya ba'i rnam pa zhes gang smras pa de ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i rang rig pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa bdag go zhes bya ba'i rnam pa zhes gang smras pa de ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The self is not the one that is said to be the one that follows after the activity of its own awareness.

original: yid kyi rnam shes ni dbang po'i shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes ni dbang po'i shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin no //
translated: Mental consciousness is not the one that follows after the sense consciousnesses.

original: de lta yin na 'jig rten phyi ma'i yid kyi rgyal srid byed pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na 'jig rten phyi ma'i yid kyi rgyal srid byed pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were, it would be the one that is associated with the pride of being the king of the mental states of the next world.

original: de yang dbang po la brtan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang dbang po la brtan pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not based on the sense faculties,

original: dbang po'i bya ba 'phel ba yin na 'di'i 'grib bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de 'grib na 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i bya ba 'phel ba yin na 'di'i 'grib bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de 'grib na 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no //
translated: because when the activity of the sense faculties increases, it decreases, and when it decreases, it increases.

original: yid kyi blor 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs gzhan 'chad bar byed pas dbang po rnams kyi 'gyur bar byed ba po yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yid kyi blor 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs gzhan 'chad bar byed pas dbang po rnams kyi 'gyur bar byed ba po yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not the one that is the agent of the sense faculties, because it is the one that is the mental awareness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa byed pa po yin zhes bya bar mi rigs te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa byed pa po yin zhes bya bar mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that mental consciousness is the agent,üîΩbecause it is the one that is the mental awareness.

original: me ni bum pa'i rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa yin yang byed pa por 'gyur ba ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te mig la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: me ni bum pa'i rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa yin yang byed pa por 'gyur ba ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni gal te mig la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Although fire causes the transformation of the form of a pot, it is not the agent.

original: bum pa ni me'i bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba kho na ma yid kyi /
analyzed: bum pa ni me'i bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba kho na ma yid kyi /
translated: A pot is not merely the transformation that is produced by fire.

original: dbang po ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba kho na yin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya'i rnam par 'gyur ba kho na yin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu bstan pa ni /
translated: But the sense faculties are merely the transformation that is produced by the mental consciousness.

original: bum pa la sogs gzhan du mthong ba yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs gzhan du mthong ba yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The sense faculties are seen to be different from a pot and so on.

original: skye ba'i dang po la 'jig pa dang mya ngan la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi rnam shes kyi bsgyur bya nyid dbang po rnams ma yin pa ma yin @210a * //
analyzed: skye ba'i dang po la 'jig pa dang mya ngan la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i yid kyi rnam shes kyi bsgyur bya nyid dbang po rnams ma yin pa ma yin @210a * //
translated: The sense faculties are not the transformation of the mental consciousness that is the first to arise, such as the consciousness of sorrow and so on.

original: nam ; dang po nyid la sogs par mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: nam ; dang po nyid la sogs par mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pas /
translated: Why? Because they are seen to be the first to arise and so on.

original: dang po nyid kyang nyid kyi rnam par 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dang po nyid kyang nyid kyi rnam par 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The sense faculties are also the transformation of the mental consciousness.

original: dang po la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //üîΩgal te skye ba'i dang po la dbang po rnams yid kyi bsgyur bya yin na de bzhin du rang nyid kyi 'am /
analyzed: dang po la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o // gal te skye ba'i dang po la dbang po rnams yid kyi bsgyur bya yin na de bzhin du rang nyid kyi 'am /
translated: The first, etc.

original: gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi nges par ci ste mi 'gyur me'i bskyed bya du ba ni rjes su dpag bya thams cad du de nyid kyis mngon sum ma yin pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'on te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi nges par ci ste mi 'gyur me'i bskyed bya du ba ni rjes su dpag bya thams cad du de nyid kyis mngon sum ma yin pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'on te /
translated: If the first arising of the sense-faculties is to be transformed by the mind, then why is it not ascertained in the same way by one's own or another's direct perception? The effect of fire, smoke, is not always directly perceived by that [fire] itself.

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think,

original: lan ni / gal te me las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni / gal te me las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reply is: If smoke is from fire,

original: du ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba la me las byung ba nyid du mngon sum yin pa'i phyir dang go byed ma yin no //
analyzed: du ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba la me las byung ba nyid du mngon sum yin pa'i phyir dang go byed ma yin no //
translated: smoke is directly perceived as arising from fire, but it is not a means of knowing that.

original: 'on kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid kyi mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid kyi mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, it is directly perceived as its effect.

original: gang gi phyir de ma yin pa las log pas du ba'i ngo bor nges pa kho na de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yin gyi me'i nges pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ma yin pa las log pas du ba'i ngo bor nges pa kho na de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yin gyi me'i nges pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is ascertained as the nature of smoke by the exclusion of what is not that, it is ascertained as just the effect of that, but not as the effect of fire. This is the meaning.

original: rigs pa brjod nas rnal ma la sbyor ba ni de'i phyir /
analyzed: rigs pa brjod nas rnal ma la sbyor ba ni de'i phyir /
translated: Having stated the reasoning, the application to the natural state is stated:

original: dper na zhes bya ba ste skye pa'i dang po la yang /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ste skye pa'i dang po la yang /
translated: For example, in the beginning of birth,

original: dbang po rnams la rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag ni /
analyzed: dbang po rnams la rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag ni /
translated: the inferential factor with respect to the sense faculties,

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa yod pa yin gyi /
translated: there is the ascertainment of being its effect.

original: de lta mod kyi mngon sum nyid kyis yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi mngon sum nyid kyis yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: However, it is by direct perception itself, this is the meaning.

original: da sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pas so //
analyzed: da sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pas so //
translated: Now, the statement having a prior state is by similarity.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni khyad par las te /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni khyad par las te /
translated: Otherwise is from the distinction.

original: dus dang yul 'di ni dus dang yul gzhan gyi dngos pos bskyed bya ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus dang yul 'di ni dus dang yul gzhan gyi dngos pos bskyed bya ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This time and place are not produced by the state of another time and place. The meaning is that it is not a distinction.

original: ji ltar skye ba'i dang po 'di la dbang po ni skye ba snga ma las byung ba'i yid du go bar byed pa de bzhin du skye ba gzhan la yang /
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba'i dang po 'di la dbang po ni skye ba snga ma las byung ba'i yid du go bar byed pa de bzhin du skye ba gzhan la yang /
translated: Just as the first moment of birth is understood to be the mind that arises from the previous life, so too the other moments of birth are understood to be the mind that arises from the other lives.

original: skye ba gzhan las byung ba'i yid du go bar byed pa yin no zhes slar yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba gzhan las byung ba'i yid du go bar byed pa yin no zhes slar yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is explained again.

original: dbang po rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di yang dbang po dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag gi 'bras bu nyid du brjod pa'i shugs kyis go bya go byed du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di yang dbang po dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag gi 'bras bu nyid du brjod pa'i shugs kyis go bya go byed du bstan pa yin te /
translated: The words ‚Äúthe faculties‚Äù also indicate that the faculties and mental consciousness are understood to be the object of comprehension and the means of comprehension by the power of stating that they are the effects of each other.

original: 'di ni de'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni de'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because they are the reason for each other.

original: da las zhes bya ba ni dbang po rnams las so //
analyzed: da las zhes bya ba ni dbang po rnams las so //
translated: The words ‚Äúfrom this‚Äù mean from the faculties.

original: dbang po'i bskyed bya ni yid ma yin la /
analyzed: dbang po'i bskyed bya ni yid ma yin la /
translated: The faculties are not the product of the mind,üîΩbut the mind is their product.

original: yid kyi bskyed bya ni yin zhes 'das ma thag kho na smras pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: yid kyi bskyed bya ni yin zhes 'das ma thag kho na smras pa ma yin nam /
translated: Didn‚Äôt we just say this?

original: bden te yid kyi rnam shes nyid dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi de las yin zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: bden te yid kyi rnam shes nyid dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi de las yin zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: It is true, but mental consciousness itself is the product of the faculties because it is associated with craving for the faculties.

original: de las kyang zhes bya @210b ba yid kyi rnam shes las zhes bya ba 'dis thog ma med pa dang tha ma med pa zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩyid kyi shes ba las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las kyang zhes bya @210b ba yid kyi rnam shes las zhes bya ba 'dis thog ma med pa dang tha ma med pa zhes bstan pa ni / yid kyi shes ba las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Also from that means from the mental consciousness. This teaches that it is without beginning and without end.üîΩFrom the mental consciousness means that it arises from a previous birth.

original: skye ba gzhan las byung ba las dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis de bzhin skyed par byed pa'i ngo bor shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba gzhan las byung ba las dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis de bzhin skyed par byed pa'i ngo bor shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is known to be the nature that generates the craving for the faculties.

original: de las zhes bya ba rjes su dpag ba'i dbang po rnams las /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba rjes su dpag ba'i dbang po rnams las /
translated: From that means from the faculties that are inferred.

original: dbang po la sred pa la sogs par rjes su dpag pa las grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po la sred pa la sogs par rjes su dpag pa las grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The establishment of the inference of the craving for the faculties and so on is taught.

original: de las kyang yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las kyang yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Also from that means from the mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam shes las dbang po rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes las dbang po rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the faculties arise from the mental consciousness.

original: de'i rnam par 'gyur bas bsgyur bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'gyur bas bsgyur bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are transformed by its transformation.

original: de'i bskyed bya nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i bskyed bya nyid ma yin pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i bskyed bya nyid ma yin pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yod pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is established as the product of that, then mental consciousness that is not the product of that exists.üîΩThus, it is uncertain.

original: ma nges pa yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: ma nges pa yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that,

original: gal te yid kyi blo yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te yid kyi blo yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the mental consciousness is also like that.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba gang gis bsgyur bar bya ba gang yin pa de kho na de'i 'bras bu ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba gang gis bsgyur bar bya ba gang yin pa de kho na de'i 'bras bu ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that only that which is transformed by a transformation is the result of that?

original: ji ltar dbang po ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi 'bras bu yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the sense faculty is the result of mental consciousness,

original: bum pa ni me'i ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa ni me'i ma yin te /
translated: a pot is not the result of fire.

original: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pas de lta bu'i rigs can thams cad gsal ba kho na yin la /
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pas de lta bu'i rigs can thams cad gsal ba kho na yin la /
translated: Since there is no certainty, it is taught that all that are similar to that are only manifest.

original: ci'i phyir yang the tshom byed ces bstan pa ni bsgyur bya nyid ces bya bar nges par kho na bsgyur bya nyid yin no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir yang the tshom byed ces bstan pa ni bsgyur bya nyid ces bya bar nges par kho na bsgyur bya nyid yin no //
translated: Why do you doubt? It is taught that only that which is to be transformed is the transformation itself.

original: ma nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi rnam par 'gyur ba kho na dbang po yin te /
analyzed: ma nges pa yin no snyam du sems pa ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi rnam par 'gyur ba kho na dbang po yin te /
translated: The meaning of the question is that the faculty is a transformation of mental consciousness alone,

original: dang po la sogs pa la yang de'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: dang po la sogs pa la yang de'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
translated: because the first and so on are also its transformation.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam shes kyang mig la sogs par 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi rnam shes kyang mig la sogs par 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
translated: Similarly, mental consciousness is a transformation of the eye and so on,

original: dang ba la sogs pa yang de rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi don yin no //
analyzed: dang ba la sogs pa yang de rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi don yin no //
translated: because clarity and so on are its transformation.

original: lan gyi don ni nges pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: lan gyi don ni nges pa med pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of the answer is that there is no certainty.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: nges pa gnyi ga yang med ces bstan to //
analyzed: nges pa gnyi ga yang med ces bstan to //
translated: Both are uncertain.

original: gal te dbang po rnams blo la brten pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te dbang po rnams blo la brten pa yin na /
translated: If the faculties depend on the mind,

original: de lta ma yin na brten pa dang rten ltos pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na brten pa dang rten ltos pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then since there would be no dependence on a support and supported,

original: de'i rang bzhin thob pa med pas lan cig skyes pa'i sna tshogs pa ni mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin thob pa med pas lan cig skyes pa'i sna tshogs pa ni mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: the mind would not obtain its nature, and the various moments that arise would not obtain fearlessness.

original: de'i phyir skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgyun mthong ba nu ba bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgyun mthong ba nu ba bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the continuum of birth and death would be seen to be severed.

original: 'on te 'di'i rgyu mtshan de dang 'dra ba gzhan du rtog par byed pa de lta yin na de 'jig rten pha rol pa ma yin na de'i 'byung ba'i chos 'ongs pa yin no @211a* //
analyzed: 'on te 'di'i rgyu mtshan de dang 'dra ba gzhan du rtog par byed pa de lta yin na de 'jig rten pha rol pa ma yin na de'i 'byung ba'i chos 'ongs pa yin no @211a* //
translated: But if you imagine that the reason is different in that way, then since the other world is not that, the nature of its arising would be coming.

original: snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that,üîΩthen NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: de phyir blo gnas ba'i rten zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de phyir blo gnas ba'i rten zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The support of the mind would not exist.

original: 'grel par ni yid rten med par thal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa kho na la yid kyi 'bras bu ni rten med pa nyid kyis 'jig pa med pa nyid du mtshon par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'grel par ni yid rten med par thal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa kho na la yid kyi 'bras bu ni rten med pa nyid kyis 'jig pa med pa nyid du mtshon par byed pa yin te /
translated: In the Commentary, ‚Äúthe support of the mind would not exist‚Äù and so on. The result of the mind is indicated to be indestructible because it has no support.

original: 'bras bu dbang po la sogs pa 'jig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu dbang po la sogs pa 'jig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the result, such as the sense faculties, would not be destroyed.

original: yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya'am rang gi rigs goms pa'i bskyed bya yin la /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya'am rang gi rigs goms pa'i bskyed bya yin la /
translated: The distinction of the sense faculties and so on that are produced by mental consciousness is produced by mental consciousness or produced by the familiarization with its type.

original: yid kyi rnam shes ni rang gi rigs go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i chos ni dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes ni rang gi rigs go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i chos ni dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: The mental faculty is not the cause of the elements, because it is a property of the mind that causes one‚Äôs own class to be understood.

original: 'on kyang blo kho na la brten pa'i blo'i chos yin no //üîΩdbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa'i las sems pa'i ngo bo sems pa yid kyi yang zhes bya ba de yang /
analyzed: 'on kyang blo kho na la brten pa'i blo'i chos yin no // dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa'i las sems pa'i ngo bo sems pa yid kyi yang zhes bya ba de yang /
translated: It is a property of the mind that is based on the mind alone.üîΩThe action of volition, which is the nature of volition, is associated with craving for the faculties.

original: dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mtshan ni de la brten pa'i blo 'phen pa'i sgo nas yin pas /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi rgyu mtshan ni de la brten pa'i blo 'phen pa'i sgo nas yin pas /
translated: The cause of the faculties is the mind that is based on it, because it is projected by the mind.

original: blo yang brten pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: blo yang brten pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the mind is also the basis of the faculties.

original: 'byung ba'i chos nyid yin na rten dang ldan pa'i dbang po rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba ni yid kyi bskyed bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i chos nyid yin na rten dang ldan pa'i dbang po rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba ni yid kyi bskyed bya ba'am /
translated: If the faculties were the nature of the elements, the transformation of the faculties that possess a basis would not be produced by the mind,

original: rang gi rigs kyi bskyed byar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi bskyed byar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or it would not be produced by its own class.

original: blo'i rten gang yin ba'i rgyu mtshan ma nyams pa yin par bshad pa ni gnas skabs 'dir dgos pa med do //
analyzed: blo'i rten gang yin ba'i rgyu mtshan ma nyams pa yin par bshad pa ni gnas skabs 'dir dgos pa med do //
translated: The explanation that the cause of the faculties is the undamaged basis of the mind is not necessary in this context.

original: blo'i rten ni 'byung ba'i chos nyid du grub pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: blo'i rten ni 'byung ba'i chos nyid du grub pa yang ma yin la /
translated: The support of the mind is not established as the reality of the elements.

original: gang gi 'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa de lta bur tshig nyid las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi 'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa de lta bur tshig nyid las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the reason why it is not the cause of the elements is established by the words themselves.

original: gnas skabs kyi dbang po'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi dbang po'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: If it is established as the reality of the sense faculties in a particular situation,

original: blo rten du grub pa yin na gnas skabs la mi dgos pa'i skyon med pa yin te /
analyzed: blo rten du grub pa yin na gnas skabs la mi dgos pa'i skyon med pa yin te /
translated: then there is no fault in not needing it in a particular situation if it is established as the support of the mind.

original: dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa'i las brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa'i las brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is stated that the action of one who has craving for the sense faculties exists.

original: blo rten yin pas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: blo rten yin pas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that it necessarily arises because it is the support of the mind,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams pa rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams pa rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not exist for those in the formless realm.

original: gang gi phyir blo'i chos rgyu mtshan yin pa de'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir blo'i chos rgyu mtshan yin pa de'i phyir te /
translated: Because the mind is the cause of the elements,

original: blo'i bskyed bya rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blo'i bskyed bya rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because the product of the mind is transformation.

original: de phyir blo las dbang po yin //
analyzed: de phyir blo las dbang po yin //
translated: Therefore, the sense faculties are from the mind.

original: zhes bya ba skye ba snga ma las byung ba'i blo las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba skye ba snga ma las byung ba'i blo las so //
translated: This is from the cognition that arises from a previous birth.

original: mtshams sbyor bar /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor bar /
translated: In the Pratityasamutpada Sutra it says:

original: nus ldan mthong ba gang de la //
analyzed: nus ldan mthong ba gang de la //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is capable of being seen,üîΩetc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbugs la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba la mtshams sbyor @211b ba'i rigs pa nyid blo yang zhes bya ba rjes su bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbugs la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba la mtshams sbyor @211b ba'i rigs pa nyid blo yang zhes bya ba rjes su bstan pa ni /
translated: The principle of the connection with the birth of the arising of the breath, etc. is taught by the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the verse.

original: de ci 'dra zhig 'phen byed 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ci 'dra zhig 'phen byed 'gyur // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: What is it like that is projected?

original: skye ba snga ma las byung ba'i ji skad gsungs pa'i tshad mas grub pa yin pa /
analyzed: skye ba snga ma las byung ba'i ji skad gsungs pa'i tshad mas grub pa yin pa /
translated: It is the cognition that arises from a previous birth, and it is established by the valid cognition described above.

original: de 'dra phyis kyang 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de 'dra phyis kyang 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: That is like that, and it will be like that later also,

original: nga rgyal dang bcas pa nyid kyis gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang bcas pa nyid kyis gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the result that necessarily arises by the mere presence of pride.

original: rigs pa bstan nas /
analyzed: rigs pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the principle,

original: lung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gro ba rnams tshim par bya ba'i don du /
analyzed: lung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gro ba rnams tshim par bya ba'i don du /
translated: in order to satisfy those who follow scripture,

original: de dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa ni de'i shes pas te /
analyzed: de dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa ni de'i shes pas te /
translated: he teaches that it is not in contradiction with scripture.

original: dbang po'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu'i shes pa dmigs pa'i ngo bos bdag go zhes pa'i blo la phan 'dogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu'i shes pa dmigs pa'i ngo bos bdag go zhes pa'i blo la phan 'dogs par byed pa ste /
translated: The mind that thinks ‚ÄúI‚Äù is assisted by the result of the sense faculty, the consciousness that perceives it.

original: sngon pos de'i shes pa la bzhin du tshim pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sngon pos de'i shes pa la bzhin du tshim pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because the mind is satisfied, etc., by the sense faculty, just as it is satisfied by the consciousness of the sense faculty.

original: de la brten pa ste lus dang sems dag phan tshun rjes su byed pa can nyid yin par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de la brten pa ste lus dang sems dag phan tshun rjes su byed pa can nyid yin par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn has said that the body and mind are mutually dependent and that they follow each other.

original: bdag go zhes bya ba ni de'i bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag go zhes bya ba ni de'i bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The mind is called ‚ÄúI‚Äù because it is what is produced by the body.

original: shes pa rnams kyi rang rig pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes pa rnams kyi rang rig pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Don‚Äôt you say that consciousnesses are aware of themselves?

original: des na de la dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: des na de la dmigs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore they are observed by themselves.

original: lus med na de'i shes pa med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams na chos la dmigs pa'i shes pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas byung ba yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam shes lus dang lhan cig pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir dang /üîΩde dang bral ba'i gnas skabs ma mthong bas /
analyzed: lus med na de'i shes pa med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams na chos la dmigs pa'i shes pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas byung ba yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam shes lus dang lhan cig pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir dang / de dang bral ba'i gnas skabs ma mthong bas /
translated: And because it is seen that mental consciousness possessing pride exists simultaneously with the body,

original: yod par mi rigs pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: yod par mi rigs pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: and because it is not logical that it exists without the body, it is the result of that mind.

original: de lta na 'o na dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus kyang yid kyi bskyed bya'i khyad par du mthong bas de'i bskyed bya nyid yin no ;
analyzed: de lta na 'o na dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus kyang yid kyi bskyed bya'i khyad par du mthong bas de'i bskyed bya nyid yin no ;
translated: If that is so, then since the body possessing faculties is seen to be a special product of the mind, it is the product of that mind.

original: / de ltar na de yang lus gzhan gyi bskyed bya nyid yin la /
analyzed: / de ltar na de yang lus gzhan gyi bskyed bya nyid yin la /
translated: If that is so, then it is the product of another body,

original: de yang sems gzhan gyi bskyed bya nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang sems gzhan gyi bskyed bya nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and that is the product of another mind.

original: skye ba thog ma med par brgyud pa yin par grub pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skye ba thog ma med par brgyud pa yin par grub pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore it is established that birth is an infinite series.

original: gal te dbang po med par blo ma yin //
analyzed: gal te dbang po med par blo ma yin //
translated: If there is no sense faculty, there is no mind.üîΩBy this statement, the state of this birth is indicated.üîΩAnd since it is connected with the statement, ‚ÄúAnd that also is not without that,‚Äù the state of a previous birth is indicated.

original: zhes bya bas skye ba 'di'i gnas skabs dang / de yang de med par zhes bya ba dang 'brel pas skye ba snga ma'i gnas skabs dang / de'i yang 'og tu yid kyi rnam shes dang dbang po dag phan tshun rgyu can yin no zhes bya bas /
analyzed: zhes bya bas skye ba 'di'i gnas skabs dang / de yang de med par zhes bya ba dang 'brel pas skye ba snga ma'i gnas skabs dang / de'i yang 'og tu yid kyi rnam shes dang dbang po dag phan tshun rgyu can yin no zhes bya bas /
translated: And by the statement, ‚ÄúAnd the mental consciousness and the sense faculties are reciprocal causes,‚Äù

original: 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i skye ba'i gnas skabs bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i skye ba'i gnas skabs bstan pa yin no //
translated: the state of a future birth is indicated.

original: de las ci grub ce na /
analyzed: de las ci grub ce na /
translated: What is established by this?

original: de ltar phan tshun rgyu mtshan nyid yin @212a * //
analyzed: de ltar phan tshun rgyu mtshan nyid yin @212a * //
translated: Thus, they are reciprocal causes.

original: gyi lus tsam ni rgyu nyid ma yin na //
analyzed: gyi lus tsam ni rgyu nyid ma yin na //
translated: The mere body is not the cause.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: dbang po med par blo mi 'byung mod ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po med par blo mi 'byung mod ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf there is no sense faculty, there is no mind.‚ÄùüîΩThe body with sense faculties is not the cause of the mental consciousness, like the sense consciousnesses.

original: re zhig dbang pa dang bcas pa'i lus ni dbang po'i shes pa bzhin du yid kyi rnam shes kyi rgyu ma yin gyi 'on kyang rang gi rgyu las byung ba'i rten yin te /
analyzed: re zhig dbang pa dang bcas pa'i lus ni dbang po'i shes pa bzhin du yid kyi rnam shes kyi rgyu ma yin gyi 'on kyang rang gi rgyu las byung ba'i rten yin te /
translated: However, it is the basis that arises from its own cause.

original: de med na 'dam bu'i bam po bzhin du de las gzhan med na gnas bar mi 'gyur zhes pa de'i yid kyi rnam shes med na /
analyzed: de med na 'dam bu'i bam po bzhin du de las gzhan med na gnas bar mi 'gyur zhes pa de'i yid kyi rnam shes med na /
translated: If that is not so, then like a pile of reeds, since there is nothing else, it would not remain.

original: lus kyang rul bar 'gyur bar gnas pa ma yin pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyang rul bar 'gyur bar gnas pa ma yin pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if mental consciousness does not exist, the body would not remain, but would decay.

original: de dag rten nyid du mtshungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag rten nyid du mtshungs pa yin te /
translated: They are the same in being the basis of the mental consciousness.

original: goms pa'i yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol yin zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩde ltar gyur na dbang po'i shes pa ni dbang po las skyes pa kho na goms pas khyad par du 'gyur ba yin la /üîΩde bzhin du yid kyi rnam shes dbang po las sam de'i shes pa las 'byung ba ni khyad par can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: goms pa'i yid kyi rnam shes kyi bskyed bya yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol yin zhes bya ba'i don to // de ltar gyur na dbang po'i shes pa ni dbang po las skyes pa kho na goms pas khyad par du 'gyur ba yin la / de bzhin du yid kyi rnam shes dbang po las sam de'i shes pa las 'byung ba ni khyad par can du 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe next world‚Äù is that it is produced by the mental consciousness that is habituated to it.üîΩThus, the sense consciousnesses are produced from the sense faculties and become special through habituation.üîΩIn the same way, mental consciousness arises from the sense faculties or their consciousnesses and becomes special.

original: de bzhin du dbang po yang 'byung ba rnams las kun nas ldang bzhin pa shes pas khyad par can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po yang 'byung ba rnams las kun nas ldang bzhin pa shes pas khyad par can du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the sense faculties arise from the elements and become special through the arising of consciousness.

original: de'i phyir dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus nyid kyi rnam shes sam cig shos kyi rgyu yin gyi de ni lus kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus nyid kyi rnam shes sam cig shos kyi rgyu yin gyi de ni lus kyi ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the body together with the sense faculties is the cause of the consciousness, but not the body alone.

original: 'di la brjod pa dbang po'i shes pa rnams dang po'i goms pa bskyed bya ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa dbang po'i shes pa rnams dang po'i goms pa bskyed bya ma yin te /
translated: Here it is said: The sense consciousnesses are not produced by habituation,

original: glur blangs pa la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin du de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: glur blangs pa la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin du de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not seen to have the particular nature of being produced by that, like the consciousness of singing and so on.

original: mthong ba yin no de'i bskyed bya nyid yin pa la su zhig 'gog par byed /üîΩdbang po dang yid kyi rnam shes dag yid kyi bskyed bya'am /
analyzed: mthong ba yin no de'i bskyed bya nyid yin pa la su zhig 'gog par byed / dbang po dang yid kyi rnam shes dag yid kyi bskyed bya'am /
translated: Who denies that they are produced by that?üîΩAre the sense consciousnesses and mental consciousnesses produced by the mental faculty?

original: goms pa'i bskyed bya yang rung ba'i khyad par yin na ni /
analyzed: goms pa'i bskyed bya yang rung ba'i khyad par yin na ni /
translated: Or are they produced by habituation?

original: de'i tshe yang de bzhin du yod pa'i phyir ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol med pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang de bzhin du yod pa'i phyir ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol med pa yin na /
translated: If so, then just like that, how can there be no other world?

original: 'di ltar re zhig rtag pa'i lus kyang rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig rtag pa'i lus kyang rgyu ma yin te /
translated: In this way, first, a permanent body is not the cause,

original: tshad ma dang 'gal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma dang 'gal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contradicts valid cognition.

original: mi rtag pa nyid yin na de nyid phan tshun rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro snyam pa'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid yin na de nyid phan tshun rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro snyam pa'i dgongs pas /
translated: With that thought, he says:

original: rim bzhin skye ba can dag ni //
analyzed: rim bzhin skye ba can dag ni //
translated: Things that arise in sequence

original: rtag las skye ba mi 'thad phyir //
analyzed: rtag las skye ba mi 'thad phyir //
translated: Do not arise from a permanent thing.

original: ltos par mi rung ba yi phyir //
analyzed: ltos par mi rung ba yi phyir //
translated: Because it is not tenable that theyüîΩDepend on a permanent thing.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtag pa tshad ma yin pa'i rigs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtag pa tshad ma yin pa'i rigs pa ste /
translated: This is the reasoning that a permanent thing is not a valid cause.

original: yid rtag pa'i lus kyi bskyed bya nyid yin pa dgag pa la yang rjes su bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yid rtag pa'i lus kyi bskyed bya nyid yin pa dgag pa la yang rjes su bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching on the refutation of the mind being the permanent body‚Äôs product is:üîΩThings that arise in sequence

original: rim can min las rim can min /üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rim can min las rim can min / zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Do not arise from a nonsequential thing.

original: rtag pa nyid kyang yul dang dus ma chad pa'i yod pa can @212b gyi dngos po yin zhes bya ba'i rigs pas /üîΩdus gsum ma chad pa dang / yul ma chad pa las kyang mngon sum la sogs pa rnams kyi nges na nges pas rjes su dpog par byed pa'i bya ba can mthong ba ni /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyang yul dang dus ma chad pa'i yod pa can @212b gyi dngos po yin zhes bya ba'i rigs pas / dus gsum ma chad pa dang / yul ma chad pa las kyang mngon sum la sogs pa rnams kyi nges na nges pas rjes su dpog par byed pa'i bya ba can mthong ba ni /
translated: The reasoning that a permanent thing is an entity that exists without interruption in terms of time and place is:üîΩDirect perception and so on do not see things that are interrupted in terms of the three times and in terms of place.

original: ma bcad pa kho na yul du byed pa'i phyir rim pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: ma bcad pa kho na yul du byed pa'i phyir rim pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the activity of inference is to see things that are not interrupted.

original: dus chad pa po yod pa ma yin pa nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dus chad pa po yod pa ma yin pa nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the time of the effect is not ascertained,üîΩthe object is not ascertained.üîΩThe refutation of the imputation of the cause as a thing that is not

original: yul yang ma bcad pa'i dngos po rgyu nyid du brtags pa de sel bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: yul yang ma bcad pa'i dngos po rgyu nyid du brtags pa de sel bar byed pa ni /
translated: cut off is

original: rim can min las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rim can min las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äúnot from a nonsequential cause.‚Äù

original: rim can zhes bya ba rim pa can gyi 'bras bu nyid ni rgyu'i dus na med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rim can zhes bya ba rim pa can gyi 'bras bu nyid ni rgyu'i dus na med pa yin gyi /
translated: A sequential cause is a cause that does not exist at the time of the effect.

original: rgyu bzhin du yul dang dus kyi nges pa med pa ni 'bras bu zhes bya ba ma yin la ;
analyzed: rgyu bzhin du yul dang dus kyi nges pa med pa ni 'bras bu zhes bya ba ma yin la ;
translated: An effect is not a cause that lacks a definite object and time, like a cause.

original: lus la de bzhin du nges pa yang ma yin zhing de bzhin du de lta bu'i rgyu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: lus la de bzhin du nges pa yang ma yin zhing de bzhin du de lta bu'i rgyu nyid ma yin te /
translated: The body is not definite in that way, and in that way it is not a cause.

original: rang yod pas gzhan gang du yang nam yang yod pa ma yin par byed na /
analyzed: rang yod pas gzhan gang du yang nam yang yod pa ma yin par byed na /
translated: If it is said that it makes something else exist anywhere at any time by its

original: de lta bu nyid du smra ba yin la de de ltar khas len pa yin na /üîΩrgyu ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du smra ba yin la de de ltar khas len pa yin na / rgyu ma yin zhing /
translated: own existence, then that is the way it is said, and that is the way it is accepted.

original: 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
translated: In that case, it is not a cause, and it is not an effect.üîΩBecause there is no distinction, there would be no adopting or rejecting of

original: rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir 'gro ba rnams len pa dang 'dor ba med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir 'gro ba rnams len pa dang 'dor ba med par 'gyur te /
translated: beings.

original: de'i phyir / ji ltar blo lus la rten par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir / ji ltar blo lus la rten par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could the mind be supported by the body?

original: de lta yin du zad mod ces bya bar yang tshangs pa rigs pa ma yin par brjod byar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin du zad mod ces bya bar yang tshangs pa rigs pa ma yin par brjod byar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if that were so, it is not said that the claim of BrahmƒÅ is not reasonable.

original: de ltar rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not so understood.

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i nges pa las yul nges pa la sogs pa'i dngos po kho nar nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i nges pa las yul nges pa la sogs pa'i dngos po kho nar nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because certainty about the object, etc. is ascertained only by the thing that is the consequence of seeing.

original: ma bcad pa'i rtogs pas yang khyab pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma bcad pa'i rtogs pas yang khyab pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it pervaded by the understanding of what is not excluded,

original: de la yang gzhan la yang rtogs pa ni khyab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan la yang rtogs pa ni khyab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in that case, the understanding of something else would be the pervasion.

original: so sor snang ba nges pa nyid kyang mthong ba las 'byung bar nges pa ni /üîΩde kho na bzhin yin la /
analyzed: so sor snang ba nges pa nyid kyang mthong ba las 'byung bar nges pa ni / de kho na bzhin yin la /
translated: The certainty of the individual appearances arises from seeing.üîΩIt is ascertained just as it is.

original: de kho na las khyab bar nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de kho na las khyab bar nges pa yin te /
translated: It is ascertained as pervaded by that alone,

original: gzhan du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not reasonable otherwise.

original: de bzhin du dus du ma la sogs pa nyid du ma nges pa nyid du snang ba ni rtag pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du dus du ma la sogs pa nyid du ma nges pa nyid du snang ba ni rtag pa nyid yin la /
translated: Similarly, the appearance of what is not ascertained as having many times, etc. is permanent.

original: de khas len pa yang rjes su dpag pa la sogs par smra ba khyab pa nges la sogs pa khas len pa dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de khas len pa yang rjes su dpag pa la sogs par smra ba khyab pa nges la sogs pa khas len pa dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, to accept that is contradictory to accepting that the reason and so on are pervasives.

original: dgag pa ni /üîΩkhyad par can min ltos pa'ang med //
analyzed: dgag pa ni / khyad par can min ltos pa'ang med //
translated: The refutation is:

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: There is no dependence on that which is not a specific thing.

original: de de lta yin na yul lam dus gcig la khyad par can ma yin pa rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de de lta yin na yul lam dus gcig la khyad par can ma yin pa rtogs pa ste /
translated: If that were so, then in one place or time, there would be no realization of a specific thing,

original: cha dang bral ba yin na ji ltar dus dang yul gzhan la sogs pa la ltos pa yin rtogs pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par nyid kyis rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir /üîΩrtogs pa'i @213a * //
analyzed: cha dang bral ba yin na ji ltar dus dang yul gzhan la sogs pa la ltos pa yin rtogs pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par nyid kyis rtogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir / rtogs pa'i @213a * //
translated: that is, there would be no parts. How could it depend on another time, place, and so on? Because the difference of the effect of realization is the final realization.

original: mthar thug pa ma yin na /
analyzed: mthar thug pa ma yin na /
translated: If it is not the final realization,

original: ji srid rtogs pa de srid du yod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji srid rtogs pa de srid du yod pa yin no //
translated: then it would exist for as long as there is realization.

original: de srid du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de srid du ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not for as long as that,

original: gzhan du de nyid nges pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du de nyid nges pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is ascertained as that elsewhere.

original: ma yin te de nyid kyi nges pa ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa yul yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: ma yin te de nyid kyi nges pa ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa yul yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: That is not so, because the ascertainment of that is the elimination of that which is not its effect.

original: de lta bu'i dgongs pas kyang rjes su dpag pa'i khyab pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i dgongs pas kyang rjes su dpag pa'i khyab pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the pervasion of the inference is stated by the intention of the passage.

original: de bzhin du 'grel par yang de'i tshe ma rtogs pa ni de'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'grel par yang de'i tshe ma rtogs pa ni de'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the Commentary states: ‚ÄúAt that time, what is not understood is not the cause.

original: gal te rtogs na ni de dang gcig yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rtogs na ni de dang gcig yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it were understood, then because it is one with that,

original: 'jig pa'i mthar thug pa rtogs pa'i phyir de nyid kyi tshe zhig par 'gyur te zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i mthar thug pa rtogs pa'i phyir de nyid kyi tshe zhig par 'gyur te zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: at the time of understanding the final moment of cessation, it would cease.‚Äù

original: nges pa rnam par gcod pa med na 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa khyab pa nges pa med pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: nges pa rnam par gcod pa med na 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa khyab pa nges pa med pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ram /
translated: If there were no exclusion of the ascertained, then the pervasion of being the effect and so on would not be ascertained, and because it would be understood by others,

original: de srid dang de srid ma yin pa zhes 'dzin par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de srid dang de srid ma yin pa zhes 'dzin par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: it would not be apprehended as ‚Äúif this exists, that exists‚Äù and ‚Äúif this does not exist, that does not exist.‚Äù

original: rnam par shes pa ni gzhan rig pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gzhan rig pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: This is because consciousness is not the apprehender of another,

original: ma rtogs pa thams cad kyis dogs pa ring du nus pa'i phyir dang / rim pa nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa thams cad kyis dogs pa ring du nus pa'i phyir dang / rim pa nges pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not possible to doubt all that is not understood, and because the order is definite.

original: rgyu'i rim pa nges pa kho nar yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu'i rim pa nges pa kho nar yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that the order of the causes is definite.

original: rim gyis blo 'byung na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim gyis blo 'byung na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the mind arises in sequence,üîΩThe mind is not different from the object.

original: rig pa ni nye ba nyid yin la rig pa ma yin pa na de dang tha dad pa yin te /üîΩde dang tha mi dad pa yin na de'i rig pas de rig pa ma yin par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rig pa ni nye ba nyid yin la rig pa ma yin pa na de dang tha dad pa yin te / de dang tha mi dad pa yin na de'i rig pas de rig pa ma yin par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: If it were not different from the object, it would not be logical for the mind to be aware of the object.üîΩThe following verse is stated to show this.

original: yid kyi blo 'di ni rim pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi blo 'di ni rim pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mind of the intellect is sequential, etc.

original: tha mi dad pa nyid ni 'dra ba nyid yin la de'i tshe yang yod pa yin na gzhan gyi tshe yang ji ltar yin /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid ni 'dra ba nyid yin la de'i tshe yang yod pa yin na gzhan gyi tshe yang ji ltar yin /
