translated: If it were not different, it would be the same as the object. If it were the same, then it would exist at the time of the object. But how could it exist at another time?üîΩThe following verse is stated in response to this question.

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni de med nyid //üîΩces bya ba ci las yin zhe na /üîΩde lta na de 'bras bu byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te srid pa ni ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni de med nyid // ces bya ba ci las yin zhe na / de lta na de 'bras bu byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te srid pa ni ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: If it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.

original: rtogs pa yang mthong ba'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa yang mthong ba'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: If it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.

original: rang gi dus tsam yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi dus tsam yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not different, it would exist at the time of the object.üîΩIf it were

original: de nyid ngo shes pa yang mthong ba dang 'gal bas don byed pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ngo shes pa yang mthong ba dang 'gal bas don byed pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is not an object that performs a function, since it is contradictory that it is seen and also recognized as just that.

original: rim pa med pa kho na rtag pa nyid rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rim pa med pa kho na rtag pa nyid rgyu yin no //
translated: It is only a permanent cause that is not sequential.

original: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yang de'i tshe kho na 'byung gi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yang de'i tshe kho na 'byung gi /
translated: Therefore, its effect also arises just at that time.

original: dus gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not arise at another time,

original: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no cause. This is the meaning.

original: gang gi 'bras bu gang yin pa de de dang nye ba yin na /
analyzed: gang gi 'bras bu gang yin pa de de dang nye ba yin na /
translated: If the effect of a cause is close to it,

original: 'bras bu gzhan bzhin du 'byung ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan bzhin du 'byung ba kho na yin te /
translated: it arises just like another effect.

original: gzhan du na rjes su 'gro ba med na ldog pa yang med pas rgyu ma yin pa @213b nyid thob pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan du na rjes su 'gro ba med na ldog pa yang med pas rgyu ma yin pa @213b nyid thob pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Otherwise, if there is no concomitance, there is also no reversal. Therefore, it is taught that it obtains the status of not being a cause:

original: yang na rgyu las 'bras bu de'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang na rgyu las 'bras bu de'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Or, if the effect of a cause is close to it,

original: 'grel pa mdzad pa'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'grel pa mdzad pa'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the author of the commentary is as follows:

original: re zhig rim pa can mi rtag pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig rim pa can mi rtag pa ni /
translated: First, a permanent cause that is sequential

original: 'bras bu'i rgyu nyid kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyu nyid kho na ma yin te /
translated: is not a cause of an effect,

original: phan tshun rgyu nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun rgyu nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that they are mutually the cause of each other.

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du 'gyur grang na /
translated: If it is permanent, it would be a permanent entity because it is not a result.

original: rtag pa ni dus gcig pa'i mthar thug pas rim pa ma yin pa dus gzhan na 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa ni dus gcig pa'i mthar thug pas rim pa ma yin pa dus gzhan na 'byung ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma yin te /
translated: But a permanent entity is not the cause of a result that occurs at another time, because it is not sequential, since it is limited to a single time.

original: de'i tshe med par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe med par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that it would not exist at that time:

original: gal te lus nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te lus nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: If the body itself were the mind,

original: yid kyi rnam shes ni rim pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes ni rim pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: Mental consciousness is not non-sequential,

original: dus gzhan du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus gzhan du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it occurs at another time.

original: dang po 'das pa nyid dus phyi ma la rtogs pa yag ma yin te /
analyzed: dang po 'das pa nyid dus phyi ma la rtogs pa yag ma yin te /
translated: It is not that what was past in the beginning is realized later,

original: dang po rtogs pa la nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dang po rtogs pa la nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not proximate to what is realized in the beginning.

original: yid kyi rnam shes gzhan dang rim pa dang ldan pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes gzhan dang rim pa dang ldan pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that mental consciousness is only sequential:

original: yid kyi blo 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yid kyi blo 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This mental cognition

original: nye ba la skyon bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nye ba la skyon bstan pa ni /
translated: The error of proximity is taught:

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If that were not so,

original: gnas skabs kyi nye bar bsgyur ba'i ngo bo'i gnas skabs mi 'dzin pas gnas skabs bzung ba kho na yin la /
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi nye bar bsgyur ba'i ngo bo'i gnas skabs mi 'dzin pas gnas skabs bzung ba kho na yin la /
translated: It is only the state that is apprehended, not the state that is the nature of the temporary transformation.üîΩ

original: de nyid thams cad la yang yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid thams cad la yang yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But it is only the state that is apprehended, because that exists for all.

original: 'on te gnas skabs mi 'dzin pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te gnas skabs mi 'dzin pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if you think that the state is not apprehended,

original: gnas skabs kyis nye bar bsgyur ba'i ngo bo ni gnas skabs can yin la /üîΩde mi 'dzin na ma bzung ba yin zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gnas skabs kyis nye bar bsgyur ba'i ngo bo ni gnas skabs can yin la / de mi 'dzin na ma bzung ba yin zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa ni /
translated: the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúIf the state is not apprehended, it is not apprehended‚Äù is that the state that is the basis of the state is the possessor of the state.üîΩIf that is not apprehended, it is not apprehended.üîΩThe meaning of the statement ‚ÄúIf the state is not apprehended‚Äù is that the state that is the basis of the state is the possessor of the state.

original: gnas skabs bzung ba ma yin na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs bzung ba ma yin na zhes bya'o //
translated: If that is not apprehended, it is not apprehended.

original: gnas skabs kyi nye bar bsgyur ba ni rjes su byed pa ma yin te /üîΩ'on kyang de dang 'brel ba'i ngo bo yin no snyam du sems pa la /üîΩrang gi ngo bo tsam ni 'brel pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩgal te byung ba dang zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi nye bar bsgyur ba ni rjes su byed pa ma yin te / 'on kyang de dang 'brel ba'i ngo bo yin no snyam du sems pa la / rang gi ngo bo tsam ni 'brel pa ma yin par bstan pa ni / gal te byung ba dang zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: The state that is the basis of the state is not a subsequent state.

original: / gal te rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir de ltar ma rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: / gal te rtogs pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir de ltar ma rtogs pa yin na /
translated: But if you think that the state that is the basis of the state is the possessor of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is not a subsequent state, but rather the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state, and that the state that is the basis of the state is the state that is the basis of the state

original: dngos su pa'i ngo bo yang de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /üîΩrtogs pas mthong ba mngon sum pa'am /
analyzed: dngos su pa'i ngo bo yang de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la / rtogs pas mthong ba mngon sum pa'am /
translated: and the nature of the thing itself would be just as it was before.üîΩThe cognition is the direct perception of the thing,

original: cig shos dngos sum yin ba ste /
analyzed: cig shos dngos sum yin ba ste /
translated: or else it is not direct perception.

original: gzhan la tshad ma med do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan la tshad ma med do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThere is no valid cognition in regard to the other‚Äù

original: rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means that the cognition is of the other.

original: gzhan rtogs pa ni shes pa gzhan no //
analyzed: gzhan rtogs pa ni shes pa gzhan no //
translated: The cognition of the other is a different cognition.

original: dngos po ni dngos po gzhan las skye ba yin la /üîΩdus la sogs pa'i dngos po gzhan gyis nye bar bsgyur ba dang / cig shos dag gi rim pa can nam /
analyzed: dngos po ni dngos po gzhan las skye ba yin la / dus la sogs pa'i dngos po gzhan gyis nye bar bsgyur ba dang / cig shos dag gi rim pa can nam /
translated: The thing is produced from another thing,

original: cig shos su yang 'gyur ba yin gyi de dag tsam gyi khyad par @214a * //
analyzed: cig shos su yang 'gyur ba yin gyi de dag tsam gyi khyad par @214a * //
translated: and the thing, such as time, etc., is modified by another thing, and it is either in the order of the other or in the order of itself.

original: gyis 'bras bu nyid dam cig shos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gyis 'bras bu nyid dam cig shos ni ma yin te /
translated: But the effect itself or the other is not in the order of those alone,

original: rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro snam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro snam du sems pa la /
translated: because there is no difference in their intrinsic natures.

original: gal te rgyu'i rim pa can ma yin mod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rgyu'i rim pa can ma yin mod ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚ÄúEven if it is not in the order of the cause‚Äù

original: rim pa'am gzhan du dus la sogs pas nye bar bsgyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rim pa'am gzhan du dus la sogs pas nye bar bsgyur pa ma yin te /
translated: means that it is not in the order of time, etc., which is not modified.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: dngos po rnams nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi khyad par nye ba rim pa ma yin pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po rnams nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi khyad par nye ba rim pa ma yin pa yin la /
translated: The difference in the nature of things themselves is not sequential.

original: nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa ni rim pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa ni rim pa yin no //
translated: Proximity and non-proximity are sequential.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: gal te rim min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te rim min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not sequential.

original: 'bras bu ni nye ba ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni nye ba ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the effect non-proximate?

original: de kho na'i tshe ji ltar 'byung ba yin de'i ngo bo gzhan gyi ngo bor 'gyur ba ni ma yin no de lta yin na rgyu yang nye ba gcig bu'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: de kho na'i tshe ji ltar 'byung ba yin de'i ngo bo gzhan gyi ngo bor 'gyur ba ni ma yin no de lta yin na rgyu yang nye ba gcig bu'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: At that very time, how could it arise? It does not become the nature of another. If that were so, the cause would be only the nature of the proximate,

original: nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis nye ba ma yin pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ba kho nar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nye ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis nye ba ma yin pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ba kho nar bstan pa ni /
translated: and by the nature of the non-proximate, the non-proximate effect would not occur. This is taught:

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: At another time.

original: rgyu yang nye ba dang mi nye ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyu yang nye ba dang mi nye ba ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the cause also non-proximate?

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo 'bras bu ni tha dad pa yin gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa'i phyir de dag de'i ngo bos 'brel pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo 'bras bu ni tha dad pa yin gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa'i phyir de dag de'i ngo bos 'brel pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The effect of such a nature is different, but the cause is not. Therefore, they are connected by that nature.

original: de lta na de 'bras bu byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta na de 'bras bu byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In that case, it would be the effect of that.

original: nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu dang nye bar dmigs pa dag gis de nyid rtogs pa'i dmigs pa yang nye ba'i dngos po kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu dang nye bar dmigs pa dag gis de nyid rtogs pa'i dmigs pa yang nye ba'i dngos po kho na yin gyi /
translated: The object of apprehension of the cause that is apprehended and the object of apprehension of that which is apprehended are the same thing.

original: cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The object of apprehension is only the proximate thing, not the other.

original: gang lo na nye ba yin par rtogs pa de rtogs pa gzhan gyis rtogs bzhin pa ni nye ba ma yin zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba med pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la 'on te rim gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang lo na nye ba yin par rtogs pa de rtogs pa gzhan gyis rtogs bzhin pa ni nye ba ma yin zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba med pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la 'on te rim gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If one thinks that there is a contradiction in the statement, ‚ÄúThat which is apprehended as proximate is not proximate while being apprehended by another apprehension,‚Äù then the response is, ‚ÄúBut if it is gradual.‚Äù

original: rgyu gzhan dang gzhan yod pas gzhan dang gzhan du rtogs pa'i yul nyid ni gcig pu la skyes bu'i dbye ba bzhin du 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan dang gzhan yod pas gzhan dang gzhan du rtogs pa'i yul nyid ni gcig pu la skyes bu'i dbye ba bzhin du 'gal ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The object of apprehension is different because of the existence of other causes. The object of apprehension of one is not proximate while being apprehended by another. There is no contradiction in the case of a single object, just as there is no contradiction in the case of a single person.
